aWFRuleDesc.RuleDescription: If the claim is open with a loss open without benefit delivered then : 3 months after the creation the motive of closure is "without further action"("Sans suite") If the claim is open with a loss open with benefit delivered without indemnification then : 6 months after the creation the motive of closure is "without further action"("Sans suite") If the claim is open with all losses closed then : 3 months after the creation the motive of closure is "Closed"("Fermé")
aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_ClaimRuleEngine) (Def Version:11) (Implem Version:1)
class aWF_RT_Formule (aWLI_ClaimRuleEngine)
uses WFTypes, aWLI_Claim
; Rule ; Classification ; FieldDesc ; VarDesc ; Indexes Of TableDesc procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : tWFDate) var dateDeCloture : tWFDate
if (self.Sinistre__Statut <> msClosed) and (self.Prejudice__Statut <> msClosed) and (self.Prejudice__Date_de_derniere_modification = self.Prejudice__DateDeclaration) dateDeCloture = self.Prejudice__DateDeclaration self.Incrementer_En_Mois_Une_Date(3, dateDeCloture) if self.Definir_motif_de_cloture('1') endIf elseif (self.Sinistre__Statut <> msClosed) and (self.Prejudice__Statut <> msClosed) and (self.Prejudice__Date_de_modification_service_delivre <> self.Prejudice__DateDeclaration) and (self.ServiceDelivre__Date_de_derniere_indemnisation <> self.Prejudice__DateDeclaration) dateDeCloture = self.Prejudice__DateDeclaration self.Incrementer_En_Mois_Une_Date(6, dateDeCloture) if self.Definir_motif_de_cloture('1') endIf elseif (self.Sinistre__Statut <> msClosed) and (self.Prejudice__Statut = msClosed) dateDeCloture = self.Prejudice__DateDeclaration self.Incrementer_En_Mois_Une_Date(3, dateDeCloture) if self.Definir_motif_de_cloture('5') endIf else dateDeCloture = self.Date_Non_Definie endIf ; Result = dateDeCloture endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Règle de clôture
